DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : At least 5 hot flash episode and/or night sweat per 24 hour Body mass index ( BMI ) 34 kg/m2 Hypertension Shift work Psychiatric medical condition would affect outcome measure More 4 caffeine drink per day More 10 cigarette per day More 7 alcohol drink per week
